item.description:
Let's start the weekend early with WHATUPFUNK @ MARISSA'S


Enjoy our new Murano room! Marisa’s Ristorante is a traditional Italian restaurant, lounge and classic steakhouse. Established in 1988 by Marisa Marini and her two sons, Attilio and Mario, the restaurant continues to expand to now include the new Murano room- a highly stylish dinning space perfectly suitable for personal and corporate events as well as entertainment. Check out our scheduled Events.

All of Marisa’s signature dishes are personally created by Head Chef Attilio Marini, well-known for his original recipes with superb flavor. Marisa’s proudly serves only the finest prime, aged 32-38 ounce steaks, chops and prime rib

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: THURSDAY NIGHT AT MARISSA'S
